languages.text: "Это — неправый суд. Твои обвинения надуманны, а цель их — просто превратить все население Футфола в безвольных автоматонов!"
"There is nothing just about this trial. Your accusations are contrived, and their purpose is simply to turn the entire population of Footfall into pliant automatons!"
languages.original_text: "Это — неправый суд. Твои обвинения надуманны, а цель их — просто превратить все население Футфола в безвольных автоматонов!"

traits.locale_text: "There is nothing just about this trial. Your accusations are contrived, and their purpose is simply to turn the entire population of Footfall into pliant automatons!"
"There is nothing just about this trial. Your accusations are contrived and your sentences are unduly harsh."
"There is nothing just about this trial. Your accusations are contrived, and their purpose is simply to turn the entire population of Footfall into pliant automatons!"

"There is nothing just about this trial. Your accusations are contrived, and their purpose is simply to turn the entire population of Footfall into pliant automatons!"

languages.text: “这场审判没有任何公正可言。你的指控毫无根据，不过是打算把落脚港的民众变成听话的机器罢了！”
languages.original_text: "There is nothing just about this trial. Your accusations are contrived, and their purpose is simply to turn the entire population of Footfall into pliant automatons!"

traits.locale_text: “这场审判没有任何公正可言。你的指控毫无根据，不过是打算把落脚港的民众变成听话的机器罢了！”

languages.text: 「この裁判に正義などない。お前たちの告発は仕組まれたものであり、その目的は、単にフットフォールの全住民を従順なオートマトンに変えることだ！」
languages.original_text: "There is nothing just about this trial. Your accusations are contrived, and their purpose is simply to turn the entire population of Footfall into pliant automatons!"

traits.locale_text: 「この裁判に正義などない。お前たちの告発は仕組まれたものであり、その目的は、単にフットフォールの全住民を従順なオートマトンに変えることだ！」

languages.text: «Este juicio no tiene nada de justo. ¡Tus acusaciones son forzadas y su único propósito es convertir a toda la población de Paso en autómatas obedientes!».
languages.original_text: "There is nothing just about this trial. Your accusations are contrived, and their purpose is simply to turn the entire population of Footfall into pliant automatons!"

traits.locale_text: «Este juicio no tiene nada de justo. ¡Tus acusaciones son forzadas y su único propósito es convertir a toda la población de Paso en autómatas obedientes!».

languages.text: "Nichts an diesem Prozess ist in irgendeiner Weise gerecht. Eure Vorwürfe sind erfunden und dienen allein dazu, die gesamte Bevölkerung auf Footfall in willige Automaten zu verwandeln!"
languages.original_text: "There is nothing just about this trial. Your accusations are contrived, and their purpose is simply to turn the entire population of Footfall into pliant automatons!"

traits.locale_text: "Nichts an diesem Prozess ist in irgendeiner Weise gerecht. Eure Anschuldigungen sind an den Haaren herbeigezogen, Eure Strafen übermäßig hart."

languages.text: « Ces procès n'ont rien de juste. Vous inventez des accusations dans le seul et unique but de faire de la population de Castel une armée d'automates dociles ! »
languages.original_text: "There is nothing just about this trial. Your accusations are contrived, and their purpose is simply to turn the entire population of Footfall into pliant automatons!"

traits.locale_text: « Ces procès n'ont rien de juste. Vous inventez des accusations dans le seul et unique but de faire de la population de Castel une armée d'automates dociles ! »

languages.text: "Bu yargılamada bir adalet eksik. İthamların uydurma, amaçlarıysa Binliman'da yaşayan herkesi uslu otomatonlara çevirmek!"
languages.original_text: "There is nothing just about this trial. Your accusations are contrived, and their purpose is simply to turn the entire population of Footfall into pliant automatons!"
